Name: Mariusz
About: Hi! I'm Mariusz, been skating ('properly') since the start of 2022 and I'm always trying to learn new things. Recently I have been trying to learn the 'Magic' slide!

Other.Heading: Skill
Other.Content: I can skate sideways in one direction :]

Other.Heading: Weakness
Other.Content: I cannot skate sideways in the other direction :[

Other.Heading: Memorable skating experience
Other.Content: I skated down the big hill at Greenwich Park once without dying!
